segments.text: Hi , I want to check out . Here is my room key .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One second , sir , while I print out your receipt . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I ask , sir , if you enjoyed your stay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , except for one night , I enjoyed the hotel . And I loved New York , of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your honesty . I assure you there will be no cockroaches next time .
segments.speaker: S2
